zh.title: 艾达币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理中，等待突破信号]
zh.content:
目前艾达币/美元(ADA/USD)价格保持在0.325附近，近期市场表现呈现震荡整理的走势。价格上下波动不大，短期内缺乏明显的上涨或下跌趋势。若继续保持当前区间，可能会形成一个较长时间的横盘整理，等待突破信号出现。

技术指标方面，MACD线为负值，显示出市场短期内的卖压略大，但信号线未更新，因此未出现明确的卖出信号。SMA(20)处于0.3369，表明短期内价格相较于20日均线偏低，若价格回升至该水平上方，可能会带来一定的支撑作用。

支撑位目前位于0.3244附近，而阻力位则在0.3266附近。如果价格突破0.3266的阻力位，有可能开启一波反弹行情；反之，跌破支撑位可能会进一步走弱。此时，短线操作需灵活把握，关注价格突破的方向。

综合来看，当前适合观望，等待价格出现突破信号。如果价格突破0.3266并稳定运行，可能会考虑多单布局；若跌破0.3244，则应谨慎对待，考虑短期内的空单机会。

en.title: Cardano vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Cardano (ADA/USD) is trading near 0.3257, showing a relatively flat short-term structure after a modest 24h gain of 0.24%. Price action remains compressed within a tight daily range, suggesting low volatility and indecision among participants. Despite the small rebound, the broader tone still leans cautious, as ADA continues to struggle with regaining bullish momentum. The market is currently in a consolidation phase rather than a clear directional breakout.

From an indicator perspective, ADA sits below the 20-day SMA at 0.3369, which signals that the intermediate trend remains mildly bearish. The MACD reading of -0.00628 reinforces this weakness, indicating negative momentum still dominates. With RSI data unavailable, traders should rely more heavily on moving averages and price structure. A sustained move back above the SMA would be needed to shift sentiment toward recovery.

Support is developing around the session low near 0.3245, with a stronger demand zone likely sitting closer to 0.3200, where buyers may defend more aggressively. On the upside, immediate resistance appears near 0.3267, followed by the more important ceiling around 0.3370 aligned with the 20-day SMA. A breakout above that area could open room toward 0.3500, while failure may keep ADA trapped in a sideways-to-down range.

Trading-wise, cautious positioning is favored until ADA confirms direction. Short-term traders may look for range opportunities, buying near support with tight stops just below 0.3200, or selling into resistance near 0.3370. More conservative participants might wait for a decisive close above the SMA before considering long exposure. Until momentum improves, risk management remains essential in this low-volatility environment.
